info.title: Swagger Petstore - OpenAPI 3.0
info.description:
This is a sample Pet Store Server based on the OpenAPI 3.0 specification.  You can find out more about
Swagger at [https://swagger.io](https://swagger.io). In the third iteration of the pet store, we've switched to the design first approach!

post.description: This will create a new user.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The name that needs to be fetched. Use user1 for testing.

put.description: This can only be done by the logged in user.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: name that need to be deleted

requestBody.description: Update an existent user in the store

delete.description: This can only be done by the logged in user.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The name that needs to be deleted

Pet.description: Pet object that needs to be added to the store
